maqras.text: He adama di satana! Ki mai' tuhanu takida nahim kiti si_ki tusim saitana di ibadata na kari'o. Besaka uha tuhada sare'ama dusamana hai
Ate iha ki tusim meri hi badagi karana iha hi sidha raha hai
Ate usa ne tuhade vicom ika vade samuha nu bhataka dita tam ki tusim samajhade nahim si
Iha naraka hai jisa da tuhade nala va'ada kita janda si
Huna apani avagi'a de badale isa vica dakhila ho ja'u
Aja asim inham de muha ute mohara laga devange ate inham de hatha sanu kahinage ate inham de paira gavahi denage jihara kujha iha loka karade rahe sana
Ate jekara asim cahude tam inham di'am akham nu mita dide. Phira uha raha vala dorade tam inham nu kithe dikhada
ate jekara asim cahude tam inham di jag'ha te inham de rupa tabadila kara dide te na uha age vadha sakade te na piche vapisa mura sakade
Ate asim jisa di umara vadha kara dide ham tam usa nu usa di luka'i vica piche maura dide ham tam ki iha samajhade nahim
Ate asim inham nu se'ara (kavita) nahim sikha'e ate na hi iha isa de la'ika hana iha tam sirafa ika khul'hi kura'ana da upadesa hai
Tam ki uha usa bade nu savadhana kara dena jihara jivita hove ate inakari'am upara taraka sathapita ho jave
Ki unham ne nahim dekhi'a ki asim apane hatham di'am bana'i'am cizam vicom unham la'i pasu paiva kite tam iha huna unham (pasu'am) de malaka hana
Ate asim unhannu unham de adhina kara dita, huna unham vicom kujha unham di savari hai ate kujha nu iha khande hana
Ate unham la'i unham vica labha hana ate pina di'am cizam vi. Tam ki huna uha sukara nahim karade
Ate unham ne alaha tom binham dusare pujanayoga bana'e ki sa'ida unham di saha'ita kiti ja sake
Uha unham di saha'ita na kara sakanage ate uha unham di phauja bana ke hazira kite janage
Huna unham di gala tuhanu dukhi na kare asim' janade ham jihara kujha uha chupa'unde hana jam jo kujha pragata karade hana
Ki manukha ne nahim dekhi'a ki asim unham nu ika buda (viraja) tom paida kita. Phira uha pratakha jhagaralu bana gi'a
Ate uha sade la'i misalam bi'ana karada hai ate uha apani racanam nu bhula gi'a. Uha kahida hai ki hadi'am nu kauna ji'unda karega jadom ki uha zura-cura hom ga'i'am hana
Akho, uha hi jivita karega, jisa ne inham nu pahili vara paida kita si ate uha hara prakara nala dhaida karana janada hai
Uha hi hai jisa ne tuhade la'i hare bhare darakhatam vica aga paida kara diti. Phira tusim usa nala aga balade ho

Ki jisa ne akasam ate dharati nu paida kita uha isa di samaratha nahim rakhada ki inham varagi'am nu paida kara deve. Ham, usa samaratha rakhada hai ate asala vica uhi paida karana vala ate janana vala hai
Usa da masala tam basa iha hai ki jadom kise ciza da nisaca kara lainda hai tam kahida hai ki ho ja ate uha jandi hai
So uha hasati pavitara hai jisa de hatham vica hareka ciza da adhikara hai ate use vala tusim vapisa maure javoge
Sahu hai sidhi'am kataram vica kharhe pharisati'am di
Phira jhara jhasa karana vali'am di jhiraka di
Phira unham di jihare upadesa suna'una vale hana
Ki tuhada pujanayoga ika hi hai
Akasam ate dharati da palanahara ate jihara kujha inham de vica hai ate sari'am disavam ate puraba (jithom suraja nikalada hai? Da raba)
Asim sasara te akasa nu tari'am nala saja'i'a hai
Ate hareka vidarohi saitana tom usa nu surakhi'ata kita hai
Uha sarava uca darabara vala kana nahim laga sakade ate uha hareka disa vica mare jande hana
Bhaja'una la'i ate unham la'i ika ata di saza hai
Pratu je ko'i saitana kise gala nu zuka lave tam ika dahikada ho'i'a agara usa da picha karada hai
Isa la'i inham tom pucho ki inham di racana zi'ada kathana hai jam jinham cizam di sirajana asim kiti hai. Asim unham nu cikani miti tom raci'a hai
Sagom tusim hairani pragata karade ho ate uda mazaka kara rahe hana
Ate jadom unham nu samajha'i'a janda hai tam uha samajhade nahim
Ate jadom uha ko'i nisani dekhade hana tam uha usa nu mazaka vica tala dide hana
Ate kahide hana ki iha tam sirafa ika khul'ha jadu hai
Ki jadom asim mara javange ate miti ate hadi'am bana javange tam phira asim' cuke javange
Ate ki sade pichale pi'u dade vi
Akho ki ham, ate tusi' be'izata vi hovoge
Tam, iha tam ika jhiraka hovegi, phira usa samem hi uha dekhana laganage
Ate uha kahinage ki ha'e! Sadi mari kisamata. Iha tam badale da dina hai
Iha uhi nirane da dina hai jisa tom tusim inakara karade si
